techmeme.title: Anthony Levandowski's self-driving truck startup Pronto signs a deal with Heidelberg Materials to use its tech in 100+ dump trucks in mines over three years (Max Chafkin/Bloomberg)
IT management platform NinjaOne raised $500M led by Iconiq Growth and CapitalG at a $5B valuation, up from $1.9B after its Series C in February 2024 (Leo Schwartz/Fortune)
Strategy, formerly MicroStrategy, bought 20,356 bitcoin for $1.99B between February 18 and 23, taking its holdings to 499,096, worth $47B, or 2.3% of BTC supply (James Hunt/The Block)
MongoDB buys Voyage AI for $220M and plans to integrate Voyage's retrieval tools for higher-quality AI outputs with real-time operational data for businesses (Maggie Eastland/Bloomberg)
Robinhood says it received a letter from the SEC stating the agency is dropping its investigation into Robinhood Crypto, a sign of regulatory change under Trump (Tanaya Macheel/CNBC)
